alert.note: Alert for Gage; Pawnee (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:23PM CDT until August 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CDT FOR WESTERN PAWNEE AND SOUTHEASTERN GAGE COUNTIES... At 122 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holmesville, or 6 miles southeast of Beatrice, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Blue Springs, Filley, Burchard, Liberty, Lewiston, Virginia, Holmesville, Rockford State Recreation Area, and Rockford. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
